short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send hundreds of emails to brokers on TruckersEdge and find loads quicker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you having a hard time finding loads for your trucks? Are you tired of spending hours manually sending only a few emails to brokers?

Introducing Logisr: Bulk Email tool for DAT Truckers Edge loadboard.

Effortlessly send hundreds of emails to brokers and book more shipments for your trucks. Logisr is perfect for dispatchers, owner-operators, and trucking companies who go through the hassle of having to find loads every morning. 

Create an email template and press send! We will autofill the shipment information and save you time. Manage conversations with brokers through our messenger app and never miss out on any opportunities.
